name: I, Mercenary
description:
Nahiri is a mercenary and she gets hired to sabotage the power plants on the planet Purpura.

Help Nahiri to complete her mission.

HOW TO PLAY?
  • MOVEMENT - WASD
  • RUN - LEFT SHIFT
  • JUMP - SPACE
  • SHOOT - LEFT MOUSE
  • ZOOM - RIGHT MOUSE
  • SWITCH WEAPONS - TAB
  • PAUSE MENU - ESC
CREDITS:

Thank you to all the artist who made it possible to create this game.

TO THE PLAYER...

Thank you for playing my game. I hope you enjoy it!

Lots of love...

Rona Hattingh
